items.question: What is Clickeen?
items.answer: Embeddable widgets with conversions built in.

items.question: How do I install a widget?
items.answer: Copy the embed code and paste it into your site.

items.question: Does this help SEO?
items.answer: Enable SEO/GEO mode to emit schema + deep links.
